mapper.sql: output_id,output_number,output_date,od.order_customer as `client_name`,o.hander_name AS hander_name, od.product_name AS product_name

output_id,output_number,output_date,o.sell_id AS sell_id, o.hander_name AS hander_name,o.operator AS operator,o.remark as remark, psi.order_id AS order_id,od.order_customer as `client_name`, od.product_name AS product_name
mapper.select:
select
from output o INNER JOIN p_sell_info psi on o.sell_id=psi.sell_id INNER JOIN `order` od on od.order_id=psi.order_id

select
from output o INNER JOIN p_sell_info psi on o.sell_id=psi.sell_id INNER JOIN `order` od on od.order_id=psi.order_id where od.product_name like #{keyWord}

select
from output o INNER JOIN p_sell_info psi on o.sell_id=psi.sell_id INNER JOIN `order` od on od.order_id=psi.order_id where o.output_id=#{outputId}
mapper.delete:
delete from output where output_id in
#{outputId}
mapper.update:
update output
output_number=#{outputNumber},
output_date=#{outputDate},
sell_id=#{sellId},
hander_name=#{handerName},
operator=#{operator},
remark=#{remark},
where output_id=#{outputId}
mapper.insert:
insert into output
output_id,
output_number,
output_date,
sell_id,
hander_name,
operator,
remark,
#{outputId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{outputNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{outputDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{sellId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{handerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
